00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.impl;
00017 
00018 import android.graphics.Point;
00019 
00020 import com.google.android.gms.maps.Projection;
00021 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng;
00022 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.VisibleRegion;
00023 
00024 //TODO: to be deleted when com.google.android.gms.maps.Projection becomes an interface
00025 class ProjectionWrapper implements IProjection {
00026 
00027         private Projection projection;
00028 
00029         public ProjectionWrapper(Projection projection) {
00030                 this.projection = projection;
00031         }
00032 
00033         @Override
00034         public LatLng fromScreenLocation(Point point) {
00035                 return projection.fromScreenLocation(point);
00036         }
00037 
00038         @Override
00039         public VisibleRegion getVisibleRegion() {
00040                 return projection.getVisibleRegion();
00041         }
00042 
00043         @Override
00044         public Point toScreenLocation(LatLng location) {
00045                 return projection.toScreenLocation(location);
00046         }
00047 
00048         @Override
00049         public Projection getProjection() {
00050                 return projection;
00051         }
00052 }
